juzs.text: Ioqa Bu tgelda deg ufus iS, u Neppa, Izmer i yal cci
i Ixelqen tameppant, tameddurt, iwakken a kwen Ijeooeb: anwa degwen ara ixedmen igiten ilhan sennig wiyav. Neppa d Uzmir, Ipsemmie
i Ixelqen ua igenwan d idurra. Deg wayen Ixleq Uenin, ur tepwaliv ayen ixuuuen. Ernu sikked ma a pwaliv i$isiyen
Sinna, ger tii ik berdayen. Ieoi a d iu$al $uoek, iefa, u inzef
Ni$ Ncebbee igenni aqoib s teftilin, Noeooem yisent cwaien, Nhegga yasen aaaqeb n tmes
I wid inekoen Mass nnsen, aaaqeb n Loahennama. A tu$alin tucmip
Mi pwaveggoen $uoes, ad slen la tesraaria, u neppat trekkem
Qoib a ppeftutes seg iuiv. Yal tikelt ara iwaveggeo $uoes urbaa, a ten steqsin iassasen is: "aani ur kwen id iusi ara uneddao
Ad inin: "ih, iusa ya$ d uneddao, nenkeo u nenna: ur illi ay d Issuder Oebbi, aql akwen kan di le$wlav meqqwoen
U nnan: "lemmer nelli nsell ne$ nfehhem, ur nelli seg wat tmes
Qaooen s ibekkaven nnsen. Aseaq i at tmes
Wanag, i wid ippagwaden Mass nnsen, di tbavnit, ssmae akked warraz meqqwoen
Hedoet s sser ne$ ainani, ihi, Neppa Ieoa ayen illan deg idmaren
Day ur Ieoi ara Win Ixelqen, Laiif Ippuxebboen
Neppa i wen Irran tamurt d tamvuat. Eleut deg ibraeen is, ccet si ooeeq is. £uoeS tanekra
Ma tepputebtem ar, Win Illan deg igenni, ad Irr tamurt a ppertem yiswen? Appan la teppembwiwil
Ma tepputebtem, ar Win Illan deg igenni, awen d Iazen tabucivant n yid$a$en? D$a, a ppissinem anwa t unabi W
Ni$ nekoen imezwura nnsen. Amek d Zzi$ fellasen
Ahat ur walan ara ifoax, sennig sen, d idurra, afriwen ceoqen, ur coiqen. Siwa Aenin iten Iifen. Neppa, ih, Issikkid yal cci
Anwa wa ay d aasekoiw nnwen, ara kwen isellken, war Aenin? Ijehliyen atnan kan di le$ouo
Anwa wa ara kwen ioeeqen ma Ijmaa l$it iS? Maca, vellelen deg u$unfu akked leqbaea
Win iteddun, ibra i uqeoou, day ipwanha sennig win iteddun, irfed aqeoou, deg ubrid uwqim
Ini: "d Neppa ikwen id Ixelqen. Irra yawen timejjin, allen, ulawen. Drus ay tesnemmirem
Ini: "d Neppa ikwen isseftin di tmurt, ar $uoeS ara tepwafesrem
La qqaoen: "melmi lemaahda agi, ma d tidep ay tessawalem
Ini: "i Ieoan siwa Oebbi. Nek d aneddao kan ipbegginen
Mara a t walin iqeob ed, ad ndellen wudmawen n wid ijehlen. A d inin: "atan wayen tessuturem
Ini: "ma twalam ma In$a ya$ Oebbi, nek d imeddukwal iw, ne$ ma Ieun fella$? Ihi, anwa ara isellken ijehliyen seg uaaqeb aqeoean
Ini: "Neppa d Aenin, syiS numen, fellaS neppkel. A ppeeoem anwa i illan di ttelfan n uuee
Ini: "ma twalam, lemmer ad zzren waman nnwen, w ar awen d iawin aman ippazalen
S wamru akked wayen pjerriden
Kecc, s l$it n Mass ik, ur telliv d aoehbani
Ih, i kecc arraz ur nepnegzay
Ih, kecc, lxaieo ik d uuam
A pwaliv, ad walin
anwa degwen ippuhewwlen
D Mass ik, ih, i Izoan sennig wiyav, anwa iff$en abrid iS. D Neppa i Izoan, sennig wiyav, anwi ipwanhan
Ihi, ur ppak awal i inekkaoen
Ssaramen a ppestaamlev, akken ad staamlen
Ur ssemeas i yal afuean ipgallan
aqeooad ileeeun iplemmim
i igelden lxio, ippawven, idenben
amjuo, u irna d akluc
Xas $uoes ayla, igwerdan
Ma $oan as issekniyen nne£, iqqao: "d timucuha imezwura
A t Nweccem deg wanzaren
Ih, Njeooeb iten akken Njeooeb at leonan, mi gullen, ar di tuebeit, ad $elten
Ggulen ur eniten
Tezzi yas tbucivant s$uo Mass ik, nitni iisen
Iu$al amzun d lbuo
Di tuebeit msawalen
ekkret zik, ar lexla nnwen, ma a p$elltem
Teddun, sbecbucen garasen
igellil, assa, ur t ppaooat a p id ikcem". o
Oueen ppeklen, zemren
Mi t walan, nnan: "nekwni d im$eooqen
Ih, aql a$ nepwaeeooem
Inna uediq mavi nnsen: "day ur awen nni$ ara: a lemmer tesbuccuaem
Nnan: "nesbuccaa Mass nne$. Nella, s tidep, d imednas
Mqabalen, ppemyuzzamen
Nnan: "a ssexv nne$, nella d imjuoen
Ahat Mass nne$ ad a$ d I$oem sennig waya; ih, nekwni, ar Mass nne$, d imectaqen
Am akka, aqeiii. Aqeiii n laxeot, war ccekk, meqqweo kteo, lemmer eoin
Ih, i wid ipeezziben i Mass nnsen, Loennet n ssuaada
Aani Nerr imvuaen am ibe$wviyen
Acu ikwen iu$en? Amek tepeuddum
Ne$ tesaam tazmamt ideg tlemdem
degs, i kunwi, s tidep, ayen tesmenyafem
Ne$ $uowen tuqqna s$uone$, ar ass iqeiiiten, ara kwen id ias wayen teuddem
Steqsi ten ma, $ef waya, $uosen iiamen
ne$ $uosen icriken? Ihi, a d awin icriken nnsen, ma d tidep ay ssawalen
Ass ideg ara tepwafvee twa$it, ad asen inin ad knun, ur zmiren
Ad brunt wallen, ddell iwwet iten. Ni$ pwanecden ar lekni, mi llan ueeean
Eoo iyI akked wid iskaddben awal agi. Ad asen Ddu$ cwii, cwii, seg wanda ur eoin
Ad asen Fke$ lmudda. Ni$ tieeoci W teeweo
Ne$ tessutrev taqdiat, fellasen d iilaba eeayen
Ne$ $uosen tabavnit, d$a la pparun
Eubeo i ooay n Mass ik, ur ppili am bu uslem, i d issawlen mi ippueeyyeo
Lemmer ur t id issukkes l$it n Mass is, a d iu$al ar lxali, d amaafun
Ifren it Mass is, Irra t seg iaaoviyen
Qoib i k smalen ijehliyen, s wallen nnsen, mi slan i usmekti. La qqaoen: "ar neppa d aoehbani
Neppa, d asmekti kan i imavalen
Tin imueeppmen
D acu ay d tin imueeppmen
W ar ak imlen d acu p, tin imueeppmen
Tamud akked Aad skaddben tin ipoueun
Tamud pwan$an s termegt
Aad pwan$an s uueouao aqesean
Ieeppem it, fellasen, ua wavan, iam wussan, d imezgi. A pwaliv din imdanen seoaan, am ize$woan n tezdayt iruzen
Twalav ma illa wacu d igwran segsen
Iusa d Feraun akked wid i t id izwaren, akked tid ippin, s lfaliat
Auuan amazan n Mass nnsen. Issemealleq asen s lqewwa
Ih, aman asmi ccewcwen, Nebbwi kwen di lbabur
iwakken ad awen t Nerr d asmekti, ad as ccfun imeeeu$en isellen
Ma uuven di lbuq, auuvu yiwen
idurar akked swaeel ad pwarefden, yiwet n tioei ara ten ioeen
Ass nni, a ppevou tedyant
Ad iceqqeq igenni, ad icerreg, assen
Lmalayek, di leriaf is. Assen, di iam ad refdent, sennig sent, asgeld n Mass ik
A ppepufesren, assen; iccer ur iteffer segwen
Wanag win iwumi fkan tazmamt is, yeffus is, a d yini: "atan, e$oet adlis iw
esi$, nek, ad afe$ iyi twaeesben
D$a ad yili di tudert igerzen
di leonan aalayen
Izwayen is, iwaa yasen
acet, teswem di lehna, ilmend n wayen tweqmem, ussan iaaddan
Wanag win iwumi fkan tazmamt is, zelmev is, a d yini: "a ssexv iw, awufan adlis iw ur d iusi
Iqeiiiyen iw, ur eoi$ anwi
Awufan tameppant dayenni
Ayla w, ula iyi d ibbwi
Adabu w, ipwakkes iyi". i

D$a s slesla n uavet i$alen, teqqnem t

i ijehliyen. Ur t ipxauam yiwen

Nitni, s tidep, walan t ibaad

idurar ad ilin am tavui
Aebib ur isteqsay aebib
u mwalan. Ad ib$u ube$wvi, assen, ad isebbel tarwa s iwakken, seg uaaqeb, ad ipwafdu
akked tmeiiut is, akked gma s
akked walag is it iuuoen
akked wayen illan di tmurt meooa; iwakken a t sellken

ippadamen, ipsemmiden

Ma innul it lxio, ad isqucee

imezgiyen di teilla nnsen

i umappar, akked ume$bun
wid ipputebbten s wass iqeiiiyen
wid iugaden aaaqeb n Mass nnsen
War ccekk, aaaqeb n Mass nnsen ur illi segs usellek
Wid ieurben af tuzzuft nnsen
kkes ed ar tilawin nnsen, ne$ piklatin nnsen; akka, ur ppulummun
Wid ib$an sennig waya, widak d tilas ay zegren

wid ippaiiafen di ccada nnsen
wid ipearaben $ef teilla nnsen
Widak, di leonanat, d imaazuzen
Acu iu$en ijehliyen, uzlen d $uoek, imegrav qquoen
Yeffus, zelmev, d igrawen
Yal amdan, segsen, issarem ad ikcem Loennet n ssaad
Xaii! S tidep, Nxelq iten seg wayen eEoan
Ihi, ggulle$ s Mass igmav akked ituram, ar Nekwni d Wid izemren
a d Nawi ay ten yifen, deg umkan nnsen! Ur a£ izeggwir yiwen
Eoo iten ad slullven, ad uraren, ar d magren ass nnsen, win i sen ippuwaaaden
ass ideg ara d ff$en si tneilin, ppazzalen, amzun ar id$a$en sbedden
Ad brun i wallen, ddell fellasen. D wagi ay d ass i sen ippuwaaaden
S tidep, Nuzen ed Nue i ugdud is: "endeo agdud ik, uqbel a ten id ias uaaqeb aqeoean
Inna: "a yagdud iw! Nek, i kunwi, d aneddao ipbegginen
Aabdet Oebbi, teezzbem aS, tessemeessem iyi
Ad Isemmee seg ibekkaven nnwen, ad awen Ifk lmudda ar lajel ipwassnen. S tidep, lajel n Oebbi, ma iusa d, ur ipwexxio, lemmer peeoim
Inna: "a Mass iw! Nek, ssawale$ i ugdud iw, am yiv am ass
Siwa tugin i sen terna ti$oi w
Nek, yal tikelt ara ten neccde$ iwakken a sen Tsemmeev, ad rren ivudan nnsen deg imeeeu$en nnsen, ad pplen deg iceiiiven nnsen. Ggernennen, zuxxen s tem$weo
Sinna, ssawle$ asen s uaaggev
Sinna, ainani nni$ asen; s tuffra, sser, mli$ assen
Nni$: "ssutret ssmae i Mass nnwen; Neppa ard Win Ipsemmieen
Ippazen awen d ageffur, seg igenni, d ihedman
Ayla akked tarwa, Issuget awen; Ifka yawen timizar; Irra yawen isaffen
Acu kwen iu$en, Oebbi, ur aS tgim ccan
Ni$ i waya, Ixelq ikwen
Ur twalam ara amek Ixleq Oebbi ua igenwan d idurra
Irra degsen, aggur d tafat. Irra iiij d asavef
Oebbi Issem$i kwen seg wakal, am im$an
Sinna, a kwen Irr $uoes; sinna, d tuff$a ara kwen id Issuffe
Oebbi Irra yawen tamurt d tuwsiat
iwakken, degs, a ppafem iberdan d tiza
Inna Nue: "a Mass iw! Atnan auuan iyi. Ddan akked win iwumi, ayla s akked tarwa s, ay s rnan, siwa lexsaoa
Sxedmen tieila meqqwoen
Nnan: "ur ppaooat ioebbiten nnwen! Ur ppaooat Wadd, Suwaa, Ya$ut, Yaauq, akked Nauo
Ni$ aias ay telfen. Ur Trennuv i imednas, siwa ttelfan
Ilmend n tuccva nnsen, $evuen, sinna kecmen ar tmes. War Oebbi, ur ppafen imaiwnen nnsen
Inna Nue: "a Mass iw! Ur Ppaooa, seg ijehliyen, amezda$ di tmurt
Aql aK id ma Teooiv ten, ad telfen imdanen iK. Siwa tijehli akked laao, ara d arwen
A Mass iw, Semmee a$, nek akked imawlan iw, akked win id ikecmen s axxam iw, iumen, akked wid d tid iumnen. Ur Rennu i imednas, siwa aquccu
Ini: "ippuweeea yi d, ar agraw n leonun ssemeessen, u nnan: ih, nesla i Leqwoan, d lwehma
Inehhu ar uuwab, d$a numen yis. I Mass nne$, ur nepcarak yiwen
U Neppa, gedha s loeos n Mass nne$ Aalayan, ur Isai tameddakwelt, ne$ uummi S
Ih, abuhal nne$ ieekku, af Oebbi, ixmioen
Nekwni nenwa leonun akked imdanen, ur sawalen, af Oebbi, tikerkas, d awez$i
Ih, seg imdanen, llan irgazen ijjemen ddkeo n leonun. Snernan lbe$wv nnsen
S tidep, $ilen, akken t$ilem, ar Oebbi ur d Isskar yiwen, d awez$i
Aql a$ nqelleb igenni, nufa t iccuo d iassasen uqsieen, akked ijujae
Nella nep$imi $uoes, seg imukan nessemeas; win issemeessen tura, a t id immager usafu d aaessas
Nekwni, ur neeoi ma iura lhemm, af at ddunit, ne$ ma Ib$a, Mass nnsen, ad pwanhun
Llan garane$ iaaoviyen, llan wid ur nemain; ur naadil iberdan
Nmeyyez nufa, war ccekk, ur nesfunnug Oebbi di tmurt, ur T nesfunnug ma nerwel
Nnhaya mi s nesla, yis numen. Win iumnen s Mass is, ur ippagwad ara t ixauen, ne$ ara t ivuooen
Ih, garane$ imvuaen, garane$ laauuap. Wid iunzen, widak, xtaoen lewqam
Ma d laauuap, di Loahennama, d nitni ay d is$aoen
Lemmer deg ubrid ay ddan, yili Nefka yasen aman iqwan
A ten njeooeb yissen. Win iooan asmekti n Mass is, ad isaaddi aaaqeb aqesean
Leowamaa n Oebbi. Ur naaoet yiwen ar tama n Oebbi
Atan, mi ikker umdan n Oebbi ad inuj $ureS, qoib lesqen $uoes
Ini: "pnuju$ kan ar Mass iw, ur aS pcarake$ yiwen
Ini: "nek, ur pwakelfe$ $ef vveoo nnwen ne$ $ef nnhaya nnwen
Ini: "nek, ur iyi ipfukku yiwen seg ufus n Oebbi, d awez$i. War Neppa, ur ppafe$ ssoan
siwa anabi s$uo Oebbi, akked tebrap iS". Ih, i wid iauuan Oebbi akked Umazan iS, times n Loahennama, ad wekkoen degs, i lebda
Alamma mi walan ayen i sen ippuwaaaden, ad eoen anwi ay d uohifen mavi, i leslak, anwi drus iten mavi
Ini: "ur eoi$ ma iqeob ed wayen i wen ippuweaaden, ne$ ma a t Iweooel Mass iw
Amusnaw n tbavnit; tabavnit iS, ur p Immal i yiwen
Kkes ed win Iouva d amazan. Winna, iteddu, zdat deffir, s iassasen
Ad Ieeo ma ssawven tibratin n Mass nnsen. Izzi i wayen akw illan $uosen, Ieeppeb yal cci s imvanen

Aawez, xas cwii
Azgen n yiv, ne$ ssenqes segs, acemma
Ne$ rnu yas. Di Leqwoan uuun leqoaya

Ccaw n yiv, ieeaeay kteo asurif, u issewqam kteo leqoaya
Deg wass, s tidep, tce$wlev, macci d kra
Mmekti d isem n Mass ik, lhu yideS, akken iwata

Eubeo i innan nnsen, faoeq iten s leedaqa

lqut ipceooiqen, aaaqeb aqeoean
Ass ideg tamurt akked idurar ad rgagin, idurar ad u$alen am oomel ippazalen
Atan Nuzen awen ed Amazan, d anagi nnwen, akken Nuzen amazan i Feraun
Feraun iauua amazan. Newwet it tiyta tuqsiet
Amek ara teezzbem, ma tnekkoem ass ideg igwerdan ad caben
Segs, ad icerreg igenni, ad iuao wayen i wen Iwaaaed
Atan wagi d asmekti; win ioe$ben ad iawi abrid ar Mass is

Ih, Ieoa Mass ik, kecc akked urbaa seg wid illan yidek, teppekkrem deg iv, qoib sin imuren, ne$ azgen, ne$ amur wis kue. Oebbi Iwezzen iv akked wass; Ieoa ur ten teepbem ara. Issuref awen. E$oet, si Leqwoan, ayen isehlen fellawen. Ieoa ad ilin segwen imuvan. Wiyav ppinigen di tmurt, pnadin lfevl n Oebbi. Wiyav pna$en deg ubrid n Oebbi. Ihi, e$oet, segs, ayen isehlen fellawen; eallet; zekkit; oevlet aS i Oebbi, aoeiial umain. Lxio ara txedmem i iman nnwen, a t tafem ar Oebbi. D arraz it yifen, it i$elben. Ssutret ssmae i Oebbi. D lmalayek kan i Nerra d imawlan n tmes. Nefka d kan amvan nnsent, iwakken ad hewwlen wid ijehlen; ad pputebbten wid iwumi teppunefk Tezmamt; ad innerni liman n wid iumnen; ur ippili ccekk ar wid iwumi teppunefk Tezmamt, akked lmumnin; akken ad inin at wul iblan, akked ijehliyen: "acu i Ib$a Oebbi s umedya agi"?
